column5: One of our group doing a flyin 7 weeks out is concerned about not havingpx strength pain meds in the first aide kit. Of course, he nor anyone else has a valid script and not willing to take the gamble of running the border with illegal script. What do the rest of you do take a satelite phone? I know my buddy is clean he has a 8 year NA/AA pin and with him alot.

Usually all that is necessary for you to obtain a legal script is for you to tell your doctor that you are taking a trip to a wilderness area and would like some stronger pain relievers, if the need arises. Your doctor will probably have no issues with prescribing a few doses of a stronger pain reliever in that situation.
I have crossed the border many times and have never been asked about medications.
Whiskey straight up is all you need.
